snippet: Gov. Robert Bentley signed a law on Thursday granting tax credits to families who want to send their children to private schools or better-performing public schools.
abstract: Alabama Gov Robert Bentley signs law granting tax credits to families who want to send their children to private schools or better-performing public schools.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Robert Bentley signed a law on Thursday granting tax credits to families who want to send their children to private schools or better-performing public schools.

headline.main: Alabama: Governor Signs Law Granting Private School Tax Credits
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Governor Signs Law Granting Private School Tax Credits
